glsa.title: Munin: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Munin which may lead to symlink attacks, file creation, or bypass of security restrictions.

background.p: Munin is an open source server monitoring tool.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Munin. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A local attacker could perform symlink attacks to overwrite arbitrary files with the privileges of the user running the application.
A remote attacker could create files or load new Munin configuration files.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Munin users should upgrade to the latest version:
